info.name: Spigot Darker
info.description:
Slightly darker theme for the spigotmc.org site.

This project is open source and open for any contributions: https://github.com/games647/Spigot-Dark-Userstyle

You can contribute to it or make your own version. Please star it if you like the project.
info.additionalInfo:
# Changelog

## 1.3

* Dark resource tabs

## 1.2

* Toggle the visibility of the spigotmc banner

## 1.1

* Changed the following page components
    * News pager
    * Navigation tabs
    * Navigation drop down menu
    * Watched categories
    * Wiki page
    * Message editor popup
* Use more variables instead of magic values
* Improved code style

## 1.0

* First release with darker background
